answers.answer: Is that diagnosed through blood work?

I've had a terrible pregnancy so far. I have PCOS as well, but have never been considered high risk because of it. I literally could give you a list of how many things have gone wrong in the 28 weeks I've been pregnant. I hope yours stays uneventful :)

question: So I'm only 11 weeks, my dr has me on bed rest because I have pcos and chronic preeclampsia (yes already, tested and diagnosed). I hate life because I'm always nauseated or constipated does anyone else out there have the same problems?? Like on a serious note please help!!
title: high risk and hating life.
